#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int sum,k,t,x=1,n,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(x<=t)
    {
               cin>>n;
               if(n==1)
               {
                       cout<<0<<endl;
               }
               else
               {
               if(n%2==0)
               {
                         sum=1;
                         k=-1;
               }
               else
               {
                   sum=-1;
                   k=1;
               }
               for(i=n;i>=3;i--)
               {
                                sum=sum +(k*(i));
                                k*=-i;
               }
               cout<<sum<<endl;
               }
               x++;
    }
    return(0);
}
